title: Cubes May Separate, But They Donâ€™t Break
content: To ensure safety and long-term reuse, every cube is built from three strong parts that can detach under impact instead of cracking. Just reconnect the pieces and continue building
list: Each cube is three parts that detach safely under impact.
Snap pieces back together and Safely re-attach them together
Follow the short rebuild guide if you want a step-by-step guide.
